translations: 血糖过低的；低血糖症的

sentences.translation: 什么饮食是血糖过低的？ 那是瘦肉和许多新鲜的水果和蔬菜。

sentences.sentence: Balsam pear, cancer prevention, hypoglycemic with body function.
sentences.translation: 苦瓜具有纤体、抗癌、降糖的功用。

sentences.sentence: Stand well clear of a hypoglycemic logician when sustenance has been withheld!
sentences.translation: 当他营养得不到保障的时候最好不要出现在一位低血糖的逻辑学家面前！
